| Condition                                                   | Action                                                                |
| Balance < ₹500 at scheme start                              | Deposit shortfall within 1 year                                       |
| Failure to restore balance                                  | ₹50 annual maintenance fee (incl. GST)                                |
| Zero balance after fee                                      | Account automatically closed                                          |
